items.text: length ball outside off, steered to point
items.shortText: Rashid Khan to Imrul Kayes, no run

items.text: fuller on off, comes forward to defend to cover
items.shortText: Rashid Khan to Imrul Kayes, no run

items.preText: Mahneel Musa: "@Doger, Mahmudullah has been BD's Shoaib Malik for a long time now and just like Shoaib he is thoroughly underrated and stays out of the limelight."
items.text: room outside off, he stays back and cuts it away where sweeper cleans up
items.shortText: Mohammad Nabi to Mahmudullah, 2 runs

items.preText: Nabi is bowling round the stumps to the right-hander (and the left-hander too)
items.text: floated up on the stumps, turned away to square leg
items.shortText: Mohammad Nabi to Mahmudullah, no run

items.text: keeps it on the pads, slightly flatter. defended to the legside
items.shortText: Mohammad Nabi to Mahmudullah, no run

items.text: goes straighter and Mahmudullah was quick to rock back and punch it past point. Good running gives them two
items.shortText: Mohammad Nabi to Mahmudullah, 2 runs

items.text: stays back and punches this through cover
items.shortText: Mohammad Nabi to Mahmudullah, 1 run

items.text: bowled into the pads, he turns it away to midwicket
items.shortText: Mohammad Nabi to Imrul Kayes, 1 run

items.text: tossed up on the stumps, driven to long-on
items.shortText: Rashid Khan to Imrul Kayes, 1 run

items.text: full on off stump, he comes on the front foot to steer it past point
items.shortText: Rashid Khan to Mahmudullah, 1 run

items.text: flatter on the stumps, he goes back in his crease and punches it to midwicket
items.shortText: Rashid Khan to Imrul Kayes, no run

items.text: given a bit more air, on the stumps and he defends with the full face of the bat
items.shortText: Rashid Khan to Imrul Kayes, no run

items.text: goes more outside off, allowing Imrul to push it into the covers
items.shortText: Rashid Khan to Imrul Kayes, 1 run

items.text: flatter, stays back to clip it, but straight to fine leg inside the circle
items.shortText: Rashid Khan to Mahmudullah, no run

items.text: strays on the pads, allowing him to turn it away comfortably to deep square leg
items.shortText: Mohammad Nabi to Imrul Kayes, 1 run

items.text: gave himself room, but the quicker one, and he gets an under-edge trying to cut
items.shortText: Mohammad Nabi to Mahmudullah, no run

items.text: clips it to midwicket
items.shortText: Mohammad Nabi to Mahmudullah, 1 run

items.text: tossed up on the stumps, driven back to Nabi
items.shortText: Mohammad Nabi to Imrul Kayes, no run

items.text: threw his hands at it. full outside off and tried to hit it too hard. No timing, but the ball goes to long-off
items.shortText: Mohammad Nabi to Imrul Kayes, 1 run

items.text: flatter on the stumps, but he stepped away considerably to punch it between point and cover
items.shortText: Mohammad Nabi to Mahmudullah, 1 run

items.preText: Masroor: "One of the pair bat through the innings has BD any chance of stay in the tournament"
items.text: strays on the pads and Mahmudullah wanted to hit over square leg but doesn't connect. The balls rolls away on the onside
items.shortText: Mujeeb Ur Rahman to Mahmudullah, no run

items.text: good shot. Opens up the offside again, moving away and making room. Driven through cover
items.shortText: Mujeeb Ur Rahman to Mahmudullah, 2 runs

items.text: turning into the batsman from outside off, he steers it to backward point
items.shortText: Mujeeb Ur Rahman to Mahmudullah, 1 run

items.text: length ball on the stumps, stays back to clip it through midwicket
items.shortText: Mujeeb Ur Rahman to Imrul Kayes, 1 run

items.text: gets some drift and beats his attempted glide to square leg
items.shortText: Mujeeb Ur Rahman to Mahmudullah, no run
